title: MiLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with an MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are enough games on the schedule to scroll

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all the scheduled games for the selected class will load properly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on either arrow to the left and right of the date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the corresponding date according to which arrow is tapped:

Tapping on the right arrow will load the scheduled games(for the favorite team's sportcode or Triple A if now favorite team is set) of the next day
Tapping on the left arrow will load the scheduled games of the previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MiLB.TV page will load that day's scheduled games(for the favorite team's sportcode or Triple A if now favorite team is set)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on the back date navigation arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will only be able to move back to dates within the current season

custom_steps_separated.content:
When there is at least one day left in the current season
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on the forward date navigation arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will only be able to move forward to one day after the current date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the scheduled start time in the right of all games that have not started

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the word "Live" on the right of the cell for the games that are in progress

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the will see the words "Coming Soon" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the user will be unable to tap on the video to launch a stream(unless media ON in QA)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the will see the word "Archive" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the teams will be in bold black text

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sets the device time zone to CT
AND the user taps on Videos
AND taps on MiLB.TV tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the scheduled games times in the time zone of the device
AND the the teams will be in bold black text

Repeat for MT and PT

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user changes their device time zone to GMT
AND the user taps on Videos
AND taps on MiLB.TV tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see all scheduled games in ET
AND the teams will be in bold black text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the away listed before the home team for every game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the team names displayed accurately

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND waits on that page while an active game completes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the game go from LIVE to COMING SOON to ARCHIVE

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND backgrounds the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN when the user brings the app back up the grid will update accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sets their device time to 9:59 AM EST
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND notices the previous days games have loaded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when the device time has hit 10 AM EST
AND the user navigates to the scoreboard
AND back to the videos tab, the current days games will load

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game of the user's favorite team will be at the top

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user taps on the archived game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected archived game will begin to play

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the ellipses button
AND the user taps on the Gameday Audio option
AND taps on a team's live audio feed
AND presses the More back button
AND taps on the videos tab at the bottom
AND taps on a MiLB.TV live feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio will stop playing and the MiLB.TV video feed will begin

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user selects the "Live" game cell
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the MiLB.TV Subscriber Login page
AND after entering entitled account credentials, the feed will play accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user taps on a video game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will attempt to verify access
AND the user will receive a message stating:

MiLB.TV Access
You are not authorized to watch this feed.
AND there will be a Cancel button in the top-right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be able to view the game in the MiLB.TV Media Grid
AND tapping on the game will launch the video

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user taps on a game cell of a live game in Scoreboard to open the drawer
And there is an MiLB.tv feed attached to this game
And the user taps on the MiLB.tv button in that game cell
And the user is logged in with a milb.tv entitled MiLB account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will open and play successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user goes to the team page of a team that has a live game
And that live game as a MiLB.tv feed attached to it
When the user taps on the MiLB.tv link in that game cell
And the user is logged in with a milb.tv entitled account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will open and play successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user clicks on the sportscode at the top middle of the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a dropdown menu listing all MiLB Classes including Triple A, Double A, Class A Advanced, Class A, Class A Short Season and Rookie.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user clicks on the sportscode at the top middle of the screen and selects a different class from the dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the games listed change to the proper games listed for each classes.(REPEAT FOR EACH CLASS)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts to play Lehigh Valley IronPigs home games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not be able to due to feeds being blacked out

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is on the scoreboard with expanded game cells
AND a game is in Final state had a MiLB.tv feed attached
AND the broadcast is over
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MiLB.tv button will not appear in the scoreboard's expanded game cell

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all the scheduled games(for the top favorite team's sportcode or Triple A if no favorite team is set)  will load properly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND taps on either arrow to the left and right of the date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the corresponding date according to which arrow is tapped:
Tapping on the right arrow will load the scheduled games of the next day
Tapping on the left arrow will load the scheduled games of the previous day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND taps on the back date navigation arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will only be able to move back to dates within the current season

custom_steps_separated.content:
When there is at least one day left in the current season
And the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND taps on the forward date navigation arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will only be able to move forward to one day after the current date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the scheduled start time in the right of all games that have not started
AND the teams will be in bold black text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the word "Live" on the right of the cell for the games that are in progress

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the will see the words "Coming Soon" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the teams will be in bold black text
AND the user will be unable to tap on the video to launch a stream

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the will see the word "Archive" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the teams will be in bold black text

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sets the device time zone to CT
AND the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the scheduled games times in the time zone of the device
AND the teams will be in bold black text
Repeat for MT and PT

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user changes their device time zone to GMT
AND the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see all scheduled games in ET
AND the teams will be in bold black text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the away listed before the home team for every game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the team names displayed accurately

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND waits on that page while an active game completes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the game go from LIVE to COMING SOON to ARCHIVE

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND backgrounds the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN when the user brings the app back up the grid will update accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sets their device time to 9:59 AM EST
AND the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND notices the previous days games have loaded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when the device time has hit 10 AM EST
AND the user navigates to the scoreboard
AND back to the videos tab, the current days games will load

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game of the user's favorite team will be at the top

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND the user taps on the archived game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected archived game will begin to play

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the MiLB.com menu
AND the user taps on the Gameday Audio option
AND taps on a team's live audio feed
AND presses the back button
AND taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND taps on a MiLB.TV live feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio will stop playing and the MiLB.TV video feed will begin

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND the user selects the "Live" game cell
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the MiLB.TV Subscriber Login page
AND after entering entitled account credentials, the feed will play accordingly

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
AND the user taps on a video game feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will attempt to verify access
AND the user will receive a message stating:
MiLB.TV Access
You are not authorized to watch this feed.
AND there will be a Cancel button in the top-right corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the TV icon on the Navigation bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be able to view the game in the MiLB.TV Media Grid
AND tapping on the game will launch the video

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user taps on a game cell of a live game in Scoreboard 
And there is an MiLB.tv feed attached to this game
And the user taps on the MiLB.tv button in that game cell
And the user is logged in with a milb.tv entitled MiLB account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will open and play successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts to play Lehigh Valley IronPigs home games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not be able to due to feeds being blacked out

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is on the scoreboard with expanded game cells
AND a game is in Final state had a MiLB.tv feed attached
AND the broadcast is over
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MiLB.tv button will not appear in the scoreboard's expanded game cell

title: Team Names
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on MiLB.TV and views the team names
custom_expected:
THEN the names displayed should match the 'shortName' from the stats api file

i.e.
https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?language=en&date=2018-04-05&sportId=11&leagueId=117,112&hydrate=team(league),venue(location,timezone),linescore(matchup,runners,positions),decisions,homeRuns,probablePitcher,flags,review,seriesStatus,person,stats,broadcasts(all),game(tickets,atBatPromotions,content(media(epg),highlights(live),limit%3D5)),liveLookin
